titleStmt.title: Loues sacrifice A tragedie receiued generally well. Acted by the Queenes Majesties Seruants at the Phœnix in Drury-lane.
titleStmt.author: Ford, John, 1586-ca. 1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I[ohn] B[eale] for Hugh Beeston, dwelling next the Castle in Cornhill,
